hesmlclient

Class WNSimRepDatasetBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesmlclient.WNSimRepDatasetBuilder

  • public class WNSimRepDatasetBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the collection of files included in the WNSimRep dataset introduced in the paper [1], which is a complementary paper of [2]. [1] Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). WNSimRep: a framework and replication dataset for ontology-based semantic similarity measures and information content models. Mendeley Data v1. https://doi.org/10.17632/mpr2m8pycs.1 [2] Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). HESML: a scalable ontology-based semantic similarity measures library with a set of reproducible experiments and a replication dataset. Submitted for publication in Information Systems Journal.
    Author:
    j.lastra

      This function creates a collection of edge-valued data files containing a structured representation of the CondProbCorpus IC model with different WordNet-based frequency files, as described in the paper below: Lastra-Díaz, J.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WNSimRepDatasetBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • buildCorpusICmodels

        public static void buildCorpusICmodels(hesml.configurators.CorpusBasedICModelType corpusModel,
                                       java.lang.String strWordnetPrefix,
                                       hesml.taxonomy.ITaxonomy wordnetTaxonomy,
                                       java.lang.String strResultsDir,
                                       java.lang.String strICdataFilesDir)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates a collection of node-valued data files containing a structured representation of a set of corpus-based IC models and taxonomical features as described in the paper below: Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). WNSimRep: a framework and replication dataset for ontology-based semantic similarity measures and information content models. Mendeley Data v1. https://doi.org/10.17632/mpr2m8pycs.1 We use the set of WordNet-based frequency files provided by Ted Pedersen in the following repository. Pedersen, T. (2008). WordNet-InfoContent-3.0.tar dataset repository https://www.researchgate.net/publication/273885902_WordNet-InfoContent-3.0.tar Please, read the papers [1] and [2] in order to know what papers from Ted Pedersen you should cite in the case you use these files for academic purposes. The Pedersen dataset is made up a set of *.dat files distributed with HESML software librARY in the directory BELOW: ..\HESML_Library\PedersenICmodels\WordNet-InfoContent-3.0
        Parameters:
        corpusModel - Type of corpus-based IC model to be created
        strWordnetPrefix - Prefix added to all the output files
        wordnetTaxonomy - Input taxonomy
        strResultsDir - Output directory where the files are created.
        strICdataFilesDir - Input directory containing the Pederser WN-based frequency files
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - An execption is thrown whether any input file is missing.

      • getCorpusICmodelFiles

        private static java.lang.String[] getCorpusICmodelFiles()
        This function returns a String array with the names of the WordNet-based frequency files used for building WNSimRep v1.
        Returns:

      • buildEdgeBasedCondProbCorpusICmodelFiles

        public static void buildEdgeBasedCondProbCorpusICmodelFiles(hesml.configurators.CorpusBasedICModelType corpusICmodel,
                                                            java.lang.String strWordnetPrefix,
                                                            hesml.taxonomy.ITaxonomy wordnetTaxonomy,
                                                            java.lang.String strResultsDir,
                                                            java.lang.String strICdataFilesDir)
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates a collection of edge-valued data files containing a structured representation of the CondProbCorpus IC model with different WordNet-based frequency files, as described in the paper below: Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). WNSimRep: a framework and replication dataset for ontology-based semantic similarity measures and information content models. Mendeley Data v1. https://doi.org/10.17632/mpr2m8pycs.1 We define the set of WordNet-based frequency files provided by Ted Pedersen in the following repository. Pedersen, T. (2008). WordNet-InfoContent-3.0.tar dataset repository https://www.researchgate.net/publication/273885902_WordNet-InfoContent-3.0.tar Please, read the HESML readme file to know what papers from Pedersen you should cite in the case you use these files for academic purposes. The Pedersen dataset is made up a set of *.dat files distributed with HESML in the following directory: ..\HESML_Library\PedersenICmodels\WordNet-InfoContent-3.0
        Parameters:
        corpusICmodel - Corpus IC model type
        strWordnetPrefix - Prefix for the output files
        wordnetTaxonomy - WordNet taxonomy
        strResultsDir - Output directory
        strICdataFilesDir - Input directory that contains the Pedersen dataset
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • buildNodeBasedIntrinsicICmodelFiles

        public static void buildNodeBasedIntrinsicICmodelFiles(hesml.configurators.IntrinsicICModelType[] icModels,
                                                       java.lang.String strWordnetPrefix,
                                                       hesml.taxonomy.ITaxonomy wordnetTaxonomy,
                                                       java.lang.String strResultsDir)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates a collection of node-valued data files containing a structured representation of a set of intrinsic IC models and taxonomical features as described in the paper below: Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). WNSimRep: a framework and replication dataset for ontology-based semantic similarity measures and information content models. Mendeley Data v1. https://doi.org/10.17632/mpr2m8pycs.1
        Parameters:
        icModels - Sequence of intrinsic IC models to be exported
        strWordnetPrefix - Prefix of the output files
        wordnetTaxonomy - Taxonomy
        strResultsDir - Output directory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • buildSynsetsBasedFiles

        public static void buildSynsetsBasedFiles(hesml.configurators.IntrinsicICModelType[] icModels,
                                          hesml.measures.SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes,
                                          java.lang.String strWordnetPrefix,
                                          java.lang.String strWordnetDatasetDir,
                                          java.lang.String strDatasetFile,
                                          hesml.taxonomyreaders.wordnet.IWordNetDB wordnet,
                                          hesml.taxonomy.ITaxonomy wordnetTaxonomy,
                                          java.lang.String strResultsDir)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates a collection of synset-valued data files containing the evaluation of a set of measures with the input IC models on the input dataset. The output file contains all the taxonomical features and similarity values for each synset pair evoked by the word pairs in the input dataset, as described in the paper below: Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). WNSimRep: a framework and replication dataset for ontology-based semantic similarity measures and information content models. Mendeley Data v1. https://doi.org/10.17632/mpr2m8pycs.1 The paper above is a companion paper and dataset of the HEMSL paper below. Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). HESML: a scalable ontology-based semantic similarity measures library with a set of reproducible experiments and a replication dataset. Submitted for publication in Information Systems Journal.
        Parameters:
        icModels - Sequence of IC models to be exported
        measureTypes - Measures to be evaluated
        strWordnetPrefix - Prefix added to the output files
        strWordnetDatasetDir - Input directory for the word similarity benchmarks
        strDatasetFile - Full name of the benchmark file
        wordnet - WordNet database
        wordnetTaxonomy - Taxonomy
        strResultsDir - Output directory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • buildNonICbasedMeasuresSynsetsBasedFile

        public static void buildNonICbasedMeasuresSynsetsBasedFile(hesml.measures.SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes,
                                                           java.lang.String strWordnetPreffix,
                                                           java.lang.String strWordnetDatasetDir,
                                                           java.lang.String strDatasetFile,
                                                           hesml.taxonomyreaders.wordnet.IWordNetDB wordnet,
                                                           hesml.taxonomy.ITaxonomy wordnetTaxonomy,
                                                           java.lang.String strResultsDir)
                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates a collection of synset-valued data files containing the evaluation of a set of non IC-based similarity measures on the input dataset. The output file contains all the taxonomical features and similarity values for each synset pair evokated by the word pairs in the input dataset, as described in the paper below: Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). WNSimRep: a framework and replication dataset for ontology-based semantic similarity measures and information content models. Mendeley Data v1. https://doi.org/10.17632/mpr2m8pycs.1
        Parameters:
        measureTypes - Non IC-based similarity measures to be evaluated
        strWordnetPreffix - Prefix added to the output files
        strWordnetDatasetDir - Input directory for the word similarity benchmarks
        strDatasetFile - Full name of the benchmark file
        wordnet - WordNet database
        wordnetTaxonomy - Taxonomy
        strResultsDir - Output directory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • buildEdgeInfoCondProbICmodelFiles

        public static void buildEdgeInfoCondProbICmodelFiles(java.lang.String strWordnetPrefix,
                                                     hesml.taxonomy.ITaxonomy wordnetTaxonomy,
                                                     java.lang.String strResultsDir)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates the edge-based data file for the well-founded CondProb IC models.
        Parameters:
        strWordnetPrefix - Prefix for the output files
        wordnetTaxonomy - Taxonomy
        strResultsDir - Output resulting path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
